channel.title: Giving myself rights?
channel.description: So I'm in my characters file, I've found the rights section. The problem is the values are set as letters.. Example : "-rightsB", "geAmountI geItemI hiddenBrotherI hstimeZ inClopsZ isOnlineZ isSupJ jailedI killCountI lastVengJ lastVotedZ mouseButtonsJ mutedI overloadDelayZ permBannedI pestPointsI " Stuff like that, So what letter do I change it to for admin rights?

item.title: Giving myself rights?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

xhar:

Wrong section post in server help I never seen a rsps with letters before but mabey some one in the server help can help you

That’s because he was reading a file that has some form of encoding that his text editor cannot read.

OP: You’re going to have to set rights via the server. There are many ways to go about this. You can set them upon login to a specific playername, or you could make commands for one name, and he can promote himself (plus others and whatnot). Etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Giving myself rights?
item.dc:creator: @Teen Teen
item.description:
@Teen wrote:

So I’m in my characters file, I’ve found the rights section. The problem is the values are set as letters… Example : “-rightsB”, "geAmountI geItemI
hiddenBrotherI hstimeZ ainClopsZ isOnlineZ isSupJ jailedI killCountI lastVengJ lastVotedZ mouseButtonsJ mutedI
overloadDelayZ
permBannedI
pestPointsI "
Stuff like that, So what letter do I change it to for admin rights?

Read full topic
